com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources

Class LocalPhotosDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abdulrhmanil.wallhavenwallpapers.datasources.LocalPhotosDataSource

  • public final class LocalPhotosDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    A Singleton that hold 1 - a map with local (downloaded) photos names (unique ids) as a keys, and localPhotos objects as values. So we can examine in runtime a gaven photo name (id), if have been downloaded and saved in the default downloads folder, in very efficient time O(1), we concerned to update this map, in whole application lifetime. 2 - a list that hold the same local Photos objects, we use this list to sort and show them to the user in the download tab. localPhoto object hold a basis info for the local downloaded photo.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LocalPhotosDataSource.OnReloadLocalPhotosListener
      We provide reload method, that read all the info files from the storage, that run run on another thread, if you want to use it, you must send as a parameter listener reload method call afterLoading method, on the caller thread, after reload all the files from the storage.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Comparator<LocalPhoto> addedComparator
      Comparator to sort the list according to added date, in desc order.
      private java.util.Comparator<LocalPhoto> heightComparator
      Comparator to sort the list according to height value, in desc order.
      private java.util.List<LocalPhoto> localPhotosList
      List that hold LocalPhoto objects that hold a basis info of the local photos, we use this list to sort the local (downloaded) photos.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,LocalPhoto> localPhotosMap
      Map that hold the names (unique) of the local photos as keys, and the LocalPhoto objects as values
      private static LocalPhotosDataSource ourInstance
      Early initialization for the Singleton
      private static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService service
      We use this thread to load the photos names from the storage
      private java.util.Comparator<LocalPhoto> widthComparator
      Comparator to sort the list according to width value, in desc order.

      Create new Local photo to the map as will to the list, we use this method, after downloading a new photo, and we want to add it to the singleton instance, so the application will be synchronized.
      boolean contains(java.lang.String photoId)
      Check if a photo with the gaven photoId is already downloaded (considered to be local photo).

      Public static method to get the Singleton instance

      Get the list of the local (downloaded) photos, so you cn show them to the user.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,LocalPhoto> loadLocalPhotosMap()
      Method that read all the photos names (unique Id's) in the default folder of the downloaded photos, and add them as keys in the map, and for each key create a LocalPhoto object, that hold basis info for the local photo.
      private void reLoad()
      Reload all the local photos from the storage into the map as into the list
      void reLoad(LocalPhotosDataSource.OnReloadLocalPhotosListener listener)
      Reload all the local photos from the storage into the map as will into the list, in separate thread, and when the mission done, notify the caller (listener), that the mission done in afterLoading method, so can update UI.

      Remove the local photo with from the map and from the list, so the app can be synchronized.

      Remove the local photo from the map as will from the list, so the application can be synchronized.

      Remove the local photo with the id photoId from the map and from the list , so the app can be synchronized.
      boolean remove(java.lang.String photoId, int index)
      Remove the local photo with id equal to photoId from the map as will from the list, so the application can be synchronized.
      private void sortLocalPhotosList()
      Sort the list of the local photos according to the added time

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LocalPhotosDataSource getInstance()
        Public static method to get the Singleton instance

      • loadLocalPhotosMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,LocalPhoto> loadLocalPhotosMap()
        Method that read all the photos names (unique Id's) in the default folder of the downloaded photos, and add them as keys in the map, and for each key create a LocalPhoto object, that hold basis info for the local photo.
        Returns:
        map that hold Id's photos as a keys and LocalPhotos as a values.

      • sortLocalPhotosList

        private void sortLocalPhotosList()
        Sort the list of the local photos according to the added time

      • reLoad

        private void reLoad()
        Reload all the local photos from the storage into the map as into the list

      • reLoad

        public final void reLoad(LocalPhotosDataSource.OnReloadLocalPhotosListener listener)
        Reload all the local photos from the storage into the map as will into the list, in separate thread, and when the mission done, notify the caller (listener), that the mission done in afterLoading method, so can update UI.
        Parameters:
        listener - is a listener to notify him that we reload all the local photos from storage.

      • contains

        public final boolean contains(java.lang.String photoId)
        Check if a photo with the gaven photoId is already downloaded (considered to be local photo).
        Parameters:
        photoId - is the id of the local photo that you want to check if have been downloaded.
        Returns:
        true if have been download the photo with the gaven id, (the map contain the photoId), false otherwise.

      • getLocalPhotosList

        public final java.util.List<LocalPhoto> getLocalPhotosList()
        Get the list of the local (downloaded) photos, so you cn show them to the user.
        Returns:
        a list of local Photos objects, that contain basis info of the local photo.

      • add

        public final boolean add(java.lang.String photoId,
                         java.lang.String formatExtension)
        Create new Local photo to the map as will to the list, we use this method, after downloading a new photo, and we want to add it to the singleton instance, so the application will be synchronized.
        Parameters:
        photoId - is the name (unique Id) of the photo you want to add to the map and list.
        formatExtension - is the format of the photo, could be PNG, JPG.
        Returns:
        true if we succeed to add the photo to the list and map, false otherwise.

      • remove

        public final boolean remove(java.lang.String photoId)
        Remove the local photo with the id photoId from the map and from the list , so the app can be synchronized. use it when we remove a local photo from the app.
        Parameters:
        photoId - is the name (unique Id) of the photo you want to remove.
        Returns:
        true if we succeed to remove the local photo.

      • remove

        public final boolean remove(LocalPhoto localPhoto)
        Remove the local photo with from the map and from the list, so the app can be synchronized. use it when we remove a local photo from the app.
        Parameters:
        localPhoto - is the local photo you want to remove.
        Returns:
        true if we succeed to remove the local photo.

      • remove

        public final boolean remove(java.lang.String photoId,
                            int index)
        Remove the local photo with id equal to photoId from the map as will from the list, so the application can be synchronized. we use it when you want to delete a photo from the app. Notice: this app is more efficient from other method if you know the index of the photo in the list, try to use it cost O(1).
        Parameters:
        photoId - is the name (unique Id) of the photo you want to remove to the map and list.
        index - is the index of the photo you want to remove in the list.
        Returns:
        true if we succeed to remove the photo, false otherwise.

      • remove

        public final boolean remove(LocalPhoto localPhoto,
                            int index)
        Remove the local photo from the map as will from the list, so the application can be synchronized. we use it when you want to delete a photo from the app. Notice: this app is more efficient from other method if you know the index of the photo in the list, try to use it cost O(1).
        Parameters:
        localPhoto - is the photo you want to remove to the map and list.
        index - is the index of the photo you want to remove in the list.
        Returns:
        true if we succeed to remove the photo, false otherwise.
